text: The 1960-61 Austrian Cup was Austria's nationwide football cup competition. FK Austria Wien were the defending champions. ==Preliminary round == *First round with teams from the Second league The game was stopped in the 89th minute after Ortmann had 3 exclusions and an injury and left the field. Lustenau declined due to going too far getting there. Cancellation in the 88th minute: Valkanover (Feldkirch) scolded the referee and was ruled out - but didn't leave the pitch. *Replay match: == Round of 32== *Replay match: == Round of 16 == The SAK was unable as an amateur team,to provide a complete team on a weekday and announced this decision on April 8th, 1961. == Quarter-finals == *Replay match: Wacker played with the reserve team because of the championship game against Vienna on June 4, 1961, which was decisive for relegation. ==Semi-finals == == Final == *SK Rapid Wien: Ludwig Huyer - Wilhelm Zaglitsch - Walter Glechner - Josef Höltl - Walter Skocik - Karl Gießer - Paul Halla - Peter Reiter - Walter Seitl - Rudolf Flögel - Josef Bertalan coach: Robert Körner * First Vienna FC: Thomas Kozich - Alfred Pichler - Josef Webora - Karl Nickerl - Karl Koller - Alfons Dirnberger - Johann Lahner - Peter Aust - Johann Buzek - Helmut Senekowitsch - Johann Schiehl coach: Leopold Gernhardt == References == Category:Austrian Cup Category:1960 in European football Category:1960s in Austria
title: 1960–61 Austrian Cup
